Header: The Prime Minister’s Office to entertain public complaints from today
Content: The Public Relations Unit of the Prime Minister’s Office was opened today. The Public Relations Unit was opened under the patronage of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa at the RA De Mel Mawatha with the presence of Ministers and MPs of the government. Addressing the media, Premier Mahinda Rajapksa said the Prime Minister’s Office will be directing the complaints lodged by the public to the relevant government offices. The complaints will then be followed up until redress is given. Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapksa also mentioned that a convenient atmosphere will be created for the public to directly approach Government Officials.
